pages.text: As mentioned before, there is no penalty for keeping your difficulty low.  There are bonuses for increasing it though.  As your meter passes certain thresholds the mobs you fight will have a chance to drop helpful items for your adventure. These bonuses are described on the right side of this page.

Meter level 100 and higher allows Scaling Health Heart and Power crystals to drop. These can be used to permanently upgrade your health or attack power respectively.  You can reach a maximum of 80 health (40 hearts) and +20 Attack Power (10 hearts of damage).$(br2)  Meter level 200 and higher allows Netherite and Draconium to occasionally drop from mobs.  These are powerful end-game crafting components.
